wikipedia_page.main: Sophie Charlotte Bray,  (born 12 May 1990) is an English international field hockey player who played as a forward for England and Great Britain.She currently plays club hockey in the Investec Women's Hockey League Premier Division for East Grinstead.

response: Whilst still studying at the university, student Lily Owsley scored the gold medal-winning goal at the 2016 Rio Olympics with the help of teammate and fellow UoB graduate Sophie Bray.
* Sophie Bray, British field hockey player who competed for Team GB at the 2016 Summer Olympics.
